result: One action can have multiple filters that are carried out in a specific order. If a filter obstructs the execution of the action, it can also stop the remaining filters from being executed.

original: A filter can be defined as a controller class method. The method name must begin with a filter.
result: The definition of a filter in a controller class is a method that starts with the word "filter".
